entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:38 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy and ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
